channel.title: Ipban
channel.description: i have anti-spam in my server, but people keep like using spammer things to crash my 508 server.. can anyone post a working 508 ipban code or something that can help me... please... i am really mad right now... 173.64.213.42 , block this ip!!!!! he will crash your server in 5 secs!!! with his verizon internet, cheap ass... he has some kind of high tech shet. he acts like a freaking kid... thanks

item.title: Ipban
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

lol. theres 100000’s of people with these programs who can hack/crash server. ill pm u the names so u can search to fix these programs that do this.
